duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare regulatory earned rate of return, earnings sharing, and revenue requirement calculations in compliance with state and FERC regulations.
Ensure accurate and timely preparation of regulatory statements, adjustments, analyses, and supporting testimony.
Communicate with management and other departments to provide technical knowledge for pricing and regulatory decisions.
Review and raise questions to management regarding fuel and purchased power recovery and deferred energy rates.
Prepare various PUCN and FERC required analyses and filings as requested.
Ensure compliance with internal controls, identify deficiencies, and propose improvements.
Understand and comply with all policies, codes, and regulations applicable to the position and company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in accounting, business, economics, engineering, finance or related field from an accredited school and 2 years of related experience.
